name: Party Pool Online
description:
A couple of variants of Pool using Photon Networking.

As I normally tend to make local multiplayer games, the is my version of the "distance" / "proximity" / "close but far away" theme. of the 2020 Tasjam  

Big disclaimer: lots of temp art/sound taken from Team 17's Arcade Pool II (1999) (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arcade_Pool). It seems to be abandonware at this point and is freely (though probably not legally) available on a number of dodgy looking sites (e.g. https://softfamous.com/arcade-pool-2/) (2ND DISCLAIMER: don't blame me if this link is a virus :P)
